title: Checkout.com hacked, refuses ransom payment, donates to security labs
author: StrangeSound
aiHeadline: Checkout.com gets hacked, refuses to pay ransom, and instead donates to security labs—because why not throw good money after bad?

title: Zed is our office
author: sagacity
aiHeadline: Zed is now our office—because who needs a physical location when you can just be a software tool?

title: Britain's railway privatization was an abject failure
author: robtherobber
aiHeadline: Britain's railway privatization: a triumph of incompetence, delivered with precision and flair.

title: Nano Banana can be prompt engineered for nuanced AI image generation
author: minimaxir
aiHeadline: Nano Banana proves that even the smallest AI can still manage to be a bit of a banana in the world of image generation.

title: My dad could still be alive, but he's not
author: DustinEchoes
aiHeadline: My dad could still be alive, but he's not—because apparently, life has a sense of humor that I don't quite get.
